description: Type confusion in the V8 engine of Chromium allows for out of bounds memory access, which could be exploited by remote attackers through specially crafted HTML pages. This issue affects Microsoft Edge as it utilizes the Chromium open-source software, leading to potential vulnerabilities in the browsing experience. The specific version corrected is 126.0.2592.56, and the issue is traced back to changes in Chromium version 126.0.6478.54 that resolve the memory access flaw.
